main

Class Monitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Monitor

  • public class Monitor
extends java.lang.Object
    Monitor class is responsible for watching file system changes and notify Worker class about that changes through a shared queue.
    Author:
    vliopard

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  Monitor.Listener
      Listener class is responsible for watching Operating System events regarding to file access and add notifications to a BlockingQueue<FileQueue>.

      private java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<FileQueue> transferQueue

      Monitor Constructor - Initialize a Monitor object for watching file system changes.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Monitor

        Monitor(java.lang.String directoryPath,
       java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<FileQueue> transferData,
       java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue<java.lang.Integer> stopCommand,
       boolean watchRecursive)
        Monitor Constructor - Initialize a Monitor object for watching file system changes.
        Parameters:
        directoryPath - - A String containing the path to a file system directory to be observed.
        transferData - - A shared BlockingQueue<FileQueue> to write notifications about file changes.
        stopCommand - - A shared signaling queue to notify all threads the system is shutting down.
        watchRecursive - - A boolean flag that indicates whether a directory will be recursively observed.
